Document Sources.Sourced Statement: According to the Tennessee Lookout’s database, the Tennessee Association of Realtors is the sixth largest spender on Tennessee politics, having spent $6.5 million on lobbying, campaign donations and other political expenditures since 2009.
Document Sources.Source Justification: Database providing information on political expenditures

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: According to the Tennessee Lookout, the Tennessee Association of Realtors has been Sen. Art Swann’s top funder since the start of 2009, giving him $18,750.
Document Sources.Source Justification: Database providing information on political funding

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: According to the Tennessee Lookout, the Tennessee Association of Realtors has given Rep. Clark Boyd $11,500 since 2009, making it his No. 6 funder.
Document Sources.Source Justification: Database providing information on political funding
